alert.note: Alert for East Central Plains; Middle Rio Grande Valley; Northeast Highlands; Northeast Plains; Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau; Sandia Manzano And Gallinas Mountains; West Central Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 03 at 8:54AM MDT until April 05 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR ALL AREAS BELOW SNOWPACK EXCEPT THE NORTH CENTRAL MOUNTAINS FOR STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITIES AND AN UNSTABLE AIRMASS... .Strong west to northwest winds are expected to develop Tuesday over northern and central New Mexico. These winds will be combined with minimum humidities between 10 and 15 percent, as well as temperatures ranging from 5 to nearly 20 degrees above normal and an unstable airmass. While critical conditions should diminish later Tuesday evening, they are expected to return Wednesday over western and central New Mexico where several hours of single digit humidities are forecast along with strong northwest winds. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a Fire Weather Watch...which is in effect from Tuesday afternoon through Tuesday evening. * AREA AND TIMING...All areas below snowpack except the North Central Mountains from around noon Tuesday through Tuesday evening. * 20 FOOT WINDS...West to northwest 25 to 40 mph with gusts to 55 or 60 mph. The strongest gusts are expected through the Northeast Highlands and Sandia, Manzano and Gallinas Mountains. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Ranging from around 10 to 15 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Fire Weather Watch.

area.areaDesc: East Central Plains; Middle Rio Grande Valley; Northeast Highlands; Northeast Plains; Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau; Sandia Manzano And Gallinas Mountains; West Central Highlands
